alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Luzerne; Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 11:14AM EDT until July 09 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lackawanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Southwestern Wayne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Northeastern Luzerne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until noon EDT. * At 1114 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Falls to Stoddartsville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Scranton, Dunmore, Old Forge, Pittston, Archbald, Blakely, Taylor, Dickson City, Moosic and Olyphant. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
